title: Design Backend Stack Upgrade Plan
description: Plan the migration of the backend codebase from Python 3.9/FastAPI 0.68/Pydantic v1/SQLAlchemy 1.4 to Python 3.11+, FastAPI 0.115+, Pydantic v2, and SQLAlchemy 2.0. Identify breaking changes, deprecated patterns, and required code updates. Specify steps for Alembic upgrade and database compatibility testing.
acceptance_criteria: Documented migration plan covering all major dependencies
List of files and modules impacted by each upgrade
Checklist of deprecated patterns to remove
Strategy for Alembic auto-migration and database testing
